Trade/Device Name(s): AutoSure Voice 3 Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AutoSure Plus Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): AutoSure Voice 3 Plus Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AutoSure Voice 3 Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System and test strips for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm for single-patient lay use in people with diabetes; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or neonatal use.
